repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: United Packinghouse Workers of America Audio-Visual Materials
did.abstract: This collection consists of color slides and a tape recording of the United Packinghouse Workers Fourth Biennial Wage and Contract Policy Conference, Third National Anti-Discrimination Conference and the Third National Conference on Women's Activities held September 30 to October 4, 1957. It was made to let the "Little Guy" who never gets to conferences or district meetings have the living experience of taking part in a conference.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of color slides and a tape recording of the United Packinghouse Workers Fourth Biennial Wage and Contract Policy Conference.
Also tape recording of the Third National Anti-Discrimination Conference and the Third National Conference on Women's Activities held Sept. 30-Oct. 4, 1957.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: United Packinghouse Workers of America Audio-Visual Materials #5259 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
